text: aap unase kah den ki kya main allaah ke siva kisee aur paalanahaar kee khoj karoon? jabaki vah (allaah) pratyek cheez ka paalanahaar hai tatha koee praanee, koee bhee kukarm karega, to usaka bhaar usee ke oopar hoga aur koee kisee doosare ka bojh nahin uthaayega. phir (antatah) tumhen apane paalanahaar ke paas hee jaana hai. to jin baaton mein tum vibhed kar rahe ho vo tumhen bata dega
